jd: From: Kishore V, Vy Systems kishore.v@vysystems.com Reply to: kishore.v@vysystems.com Role: Cloud Data Engineer (Exp 15+)Location: RemoteMust have:Data WarehouseJob Description/ Responsibilities :We are seeking a highly experienced GeoSpatial Sr. Engineer MAP with 15 to 18 years of experience. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Cloud DWH, Informatica Cloud Scheduler, Data Integration, SQL, Informatica Cloud CLI, and Informatica Cloud. Responsibilities :Lead the design and implementation of geospatial data solutions using Cloud DWH and Informatica Cloud technologies. - Oversee the integration of various data sources to ensure seamless data flow and accessibility.- Provide expertise in SQL to optimize data queries and enhance performance. - Develop and maintain data integration workflows using Informatica Cloud Scheduler.- Utilize Informatica Cloud CLI to automate and streamline data processes. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver effective solutions.- Ensure data accuracy and integrity through rigorous testing and validation. - Monitor and troubleshoot data integration issues to ensure timely resolution.- Implement best practices for data security and compliance. - Contribute to the continuous improvement of data integration processes and tools.- Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members.- Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in geospatial data technologies.- Drive innovation by exploring new tools and techniques to enhance data integration capabilities.Qualifications:- Possess a deep understanding of Cloud DWH and its applications in geospatial data solutions. - Demonstrate proficiency in Informatica Cloud Scheduler and its role in data integration workflows.- Exhibit strong SQL skills for optimizing data queries and performance. - Have hands-on experience with Informatica Cloud CLI for automating data processes. - Show expertise in data integration techniques and best practices.- Display excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.- Possess strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross functional teams.- Demonstrate the ability to mentor and guide junior team members. - Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in geospatial data technologies.- Show a commitment to continuous learning and professional development. . - Exhibit a proactive approach to identifying and addressing data integration challenges. - Demonstrate a strong understanding of data security and compliance requirements. - Possess a passion for leveraging geospatial data to drive impactful decision Kishore - Talent Acquisition – USAEmail: kishore.v@vysystems.comVy Systems Inc
